document_data.name: Aumraeya Ulmdrin
document_data.mainbody: High and Most Beautiful Priestess '''Aumraeya Ulmdrin''' was the high priestess of the [[Firehair's House]], a temple dedicated to [[Sune]], in [[Selgaunt]], [[Sembia]], in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities:
''Circa'' [[1358 DR]], Aumraeya was the leader of Sune's faithful in Selgaunt. Her congregation within the temple consisted of 27 other priestesses and 62 followers.

On [[Uktar 29]] of the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, during the [[Sembian Civil War]], Prince [[Rivalen Tanthul]] summoned a contingent of Sharran priests to help in the upcoming [[Battle of Selgaunt]]. However, Aumraeya, together with [[Ansril Ammhaddan]] and the city's hight priests of [[Deneir]], [[Oghma]], [[Lliira]], [[Lathander]], [[Tymora]], and [[Waukeen]] protested with the [[hulorn]], [[Thamalon Uskevren II]], but he rebuffed them with accusations of cowardice. Aumraeya was the most vehement in opposing the alliance with the [[Church of Shar]].
